Class HowToPlayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrontEnd.StateLoad
      • FrontEnd.HowToPlayController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class HowToPlayController
extends StateLoad
    This class is used to display instructions on how to play the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniel Jones Ortega and David Landmaid.
